description: I. Personal care at home: a consultation on proposals for regulations and guidance. The Government response. 12 Mar 2010. 32 p. II. Dear colleague letter dated 12/03/2010 to the House of Lords from Baroness Thornton and Phil Hope MP regarding the Personal Care at Home Bill. 4 p. III. Local authority social services letter dated 12/03/2010 regarding provisional grant allocations for the Personal Care at Home grant for 2009-10. Incl. tables. 9 p. IV. Letter dated 15/03/2010 from Phil Hope MP depositing the enclosed documents in the libraries. 1 p.
